text:
In this video, we will
show you multiple ways
First, plug it in to charge

to check that the console
battery isn't dead.

Depending on how long the
battery has been dead,

it may need to stay on a
charger for a few hours.

If charging doesn't work, the
console may need a soft reset.
Unplug the console from the charger.
Next, press down on the power button,
located on the top of the console,

Then press it once to
turn it on regularly.
If all else fails, call Nintendo support

or go to support.nintendo.com
for further assistance.

If the console's still
within its warranty,
it could be repaired at no extra cost.
